name: Web tracking analyser
author: Lewis Luckhurst
description: Used to analyser various tracked information online
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com/* https://maps.gstatic.com/* https://server.webtrackinganalyser.com https://maps.googleapis.com 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src * data:; font-src * data:;
